title: Can A Straight Guy Realize He's Gay?
alternative_title: 7-kakan. - Nonke wa Gei ni Mezameru ka? ; 7-kakan ; 7日間。～ノンケはゲイに目覚めるか? ; Can a Straight Guy Realize He's Gay? ; Can I Turn Gay in 7 Days? ; Nanokakan. - Nonke wa Gay ni Mezameru ka? ; Seven Days. - Nonke wa Gay ni Mezameru ka? ; 七日间~能掰弯直男吗?
status: 7-kakan. - Nonke wa Gei ni Mezameru ka? ; 7-kakan ; 7日間。～ノンケはゲイに目覚めるか? ; Can a Straight Guy Realize He's Gay? ; Can I Turn Gay in 7 Days? ; Nanokakan. - Nonke wa Gay ni Mezameru ka? ; Seven Days. - Nonke wa Gay ni Mezameru ka? ; 七日间~能掰弯直男吗?
description:
Description :
        Takamine agrees to take part in a psychology experiment conducted by his professor in exchange for cash and extra credit. Can homosexuality be influenced by external factors? He reluctantly agrees to spend 7 days sharing an apartment with his senpai, Yusa. What will happen between them?
